00024  *    distribution.

00046 #ifndef LINEBREAK_H
00047 #define LINEBREAK_H
00048 
00049 #include <stddef.h>
00050 
00051 #ifdef __cplusplus
00052 extern "C" {
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #ifndef LINEBREAK_UTF_TYPES_DEFINED
00056 #define LINEBREAK_UTF_TYPES_DEFINED
00057 typedef unsigned char   utf8_t;         
00058 typedef unsigned short  utf16_t;        
00059 typedef unsigned int    utf32_t;        
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #define LINEBREAK_MUSTBREAK             0       
00063 #define LINEBREAK_ALLOWBREAK    1       
00064 #define LINEBREAK_NOBREAK               2       
00065 #define LINEBREAK_INSIDEACHAR   3       
00067 void init_linebreak(void);
00068 int is_breakable(utf32_t char1, utf32_t char2, const char* lang);
00069 utf32_t get_next_char_utf8(const utf8_t *s, size_t len, size_t *ip);
00070 utf32_t get_next_char_utf16(const utf16_t *s, size_t len, size_t *ip);
00071 utf32_t get_next_char_utf32(const utf32_t *s, size_t len, size_t *ip);
00072 void set_linebreaks_utf8(
00073                 const utf8_t *s, size_t len, const char* lang, char *brks);
00074 void set_linebreaks_utf16(
00075                 const utf16_t *s, size_t len, const char* lang, char *brks);
00076 void set_linebreaks_utf32(
00077                 const utf32_t *s, size_t len, const char* lang, char *brks);
00078 
00079 #ifdef __cplusplus
00080 }
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 #endif /* LINEBREAK_H */
